list.name: HEAT-EJECTOR
list.description: The next pickaxe Carl throws will drop a trail of hot rocks behind it! Opponents that touch them are set on fire and receive x damage per second.
list.descriptionHtml: The next pickaxe Carl throws will drop a trail of hot rocks behind it! Opponents that touch them are set on fire and receive x damage per second.

list.name: FLYING-HOOK
list.description: Carl's next attack makes his pickaxe pull him to the farthest point of the attack.
list.descriptionHtml: Carl's next attack makes his pickaxe pull him to the farthest point of the attack.
